This page contains a comprehensive list of security blogs and resources. It includes blogs from individual experts, cybersecurity companies, and major tech organizations. Each entry provides a link to the blog and a brief description of the content covered, ranging from ethical hacking tutorials to the latest news and insights on cybersecurity.

  • Simply Cyber Run by Dr. Gerry Auger, this blog provides guidance and resources for those looking to start a career in cybersecurity.
  • Hackernoon Covers a wide range of tech topics, including hacking and emerging technologies.
  • StationX Offers a diverse range of articles on cybersecurity, including hacking techniques, career guidance, and tutorials.
  • Null Byte Focuses on ethical hacking techniques and tutorials.
  • The Hacker News Covers the latest news on cybersecurity, hacking, and technology.
  • Graham Cluley Insights from a veteran anti-virus expert.
  • Schneier on Security Bruce Schneier's blog on security and security technology.
  • Krebs on Security Investigative stories on cybercrime and computer security by Brian Krebs.
  • CSO Online Best practices on business continuity, data protection, and security careers.
  • Dark Reading News and information on IT security.
  • Threatpost News on IT and business security.
  • SecurityWeek Cybersecurity news and information.
  • Bleeping Computer News, reviews, and technical support for security.
  • TaoSecurity Richard Bejtlich's blog on digital security.
  • We Live Security ESET's blog on security news and insights.
  • Naked Security Sophos' blog on security news and advice.
  • SANS Internet Storm Center Daily diaries on security threats.
  • Zero Day ZDNet's blog on security news and analysis.
  • Security Affairs Pierluigi Paganini's blog on security and hacking.
